structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Alternates or representatives for boards, commissions, and similar bodies.
law.text: The secretary and other state officials with the approval of the secretary may designate alternatives or representatives to serve in their capacity as members of all boards, commissions, councils, institutes, and other similar bodies within or attached to the cabinet. The secretary or the secretary's designee shall be an ex officio member of all boards, committees, councils, institutes, and other similar bodies within or attached to the cabinet.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1998.
